original_text: Who among all the gods of those nations that my fathers devoted to destruction was able to deliver his people from my hand, that your God should be able to deliver you from my hand?
korean_text: 내 조상들이 진멸한 모든 나라의 그 모든 신들 중에 누가 능히 그의 백성을 내 손에서 건져내었기에 너희 하나님이 능히 너희를 내 손에서 건지겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Who among all the gods of those nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 민족의 신들 중에 누가

sentences.original_text: that my fathers devoted to destruction
was able to deliver his people from my hand,
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 백성을 내 손에서 구원할 수 있었는가,

sentences.original_text: that your God should be able
to deliver you from my hand?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 내 손에서 구원할 수 있겠느냐?
